articles.title: Linuxový laptop od System76 dostal nový Ryzen 9 8945HS, ten však mezitím zastaral

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Sdružení CZ.NIC vydalo první stabilní vícevláknovou verzi BIRD 3.0.0. Toto vydání přináší podstatné zrychlení při větších zátěžích BGP. Dále došlo k řadě úprav vnitřní logiky, které do budoucna umožní snazší implementaci nových vlastností.
articles.title: BIRD 3 je podstatně rychlejší při vyšší zátěži

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tony)
articles.description: V pátek 13. prosince 2024 měl vývojář Michal Hocko ze SUSE přednášku na FIT ČVUT o vývoji linuxového jádra. Na žádost čtenářů Root.cz byl zveřejněn záznam.
articles.title: Záznam přednášky o vývoji linuxového jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Keycloak je Identity provider (IDP) a Single Sign On (SSO). Umožní vám spravovat uživatele na jednom místě a vytvořit single sign on – jediné místo pro přihlášení uživatelů. Už nemusíte psát jméno a heslo do každé aplikace zvlášť. Připravili jsme pro vás školení Keycloak SSO, které proběhne 10. a 11. února a zúčastnit se ho můžete online.
articles.title: Keycloak SSO: efektivní správa uživatelů a bezpečné přihlášení (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Phoronix otestoval chování nové grafické karty Intel Arc B580 ve Windows 11 (sestavení 26100; ovladač verze 32.0.101.6252) a Ubuntu 24.10 (Linux 6.13-rc3, Mesa 25.0-git) na platformě Arrow Lake s procesorem Core Ultra 9 285K. Battlemage v testu doprovodily starší modely předchozí generace Alchemist. Výsledky jsou k dispozici v testu, obecně lze konstatovat, že jsou značně nevyrovnané. Jednou je karta viditelně rychlejší pod Windows, jindy zase na Linuxu a někdy jsou výsledky víceméně vyrovnané.
articles.title: Intel Arc B580 a Windows vs Linux: zatím nevyrovnané výsledky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: V rámci projektu Fedora byla zhruba měsíc a půl po uvedení verze 41 vydána také varianta pro stroje Apple na bázi ARM SoC M1 a vyšší. Nadále jde o spolupráci Fedora Asahi SIG a lidí z projektu Asahi Linux, která mimo jiné pro tuto verzi znamená možnost hraní AAA her pro Windows na platformě Apple Silicon.
articles.title: Fedora Asahi Remix 41 pro Macy s Apple Silicon

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Greg Kroah-Hartman oznámil rozhodnutí o prodloužení podpory LTS verze linuxového jádra 6.1. Tato verze tak bude podporována nikoli čtyři, ale nově pět let. Časově to vychází až ke konci roku 2027.
articles.title: Jádro Linux 6.1 LTS dostane jeden rok podpory navíc

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Sdružení CZ.NIC vydalo novou desktopovou verzi aplikace Datovka. Verze 4.25.0 dostala novou sadu ikon pro ovládací prvky a nově je také možné zvolit vlastní téma vzhledu.
articles.title: Nová verze desktopové Datovky obsahuje správce aktivních spojení s ISDS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Hák)
articles.description: Registrace na konferenci Prague PostgreSQL Developer Day 2025, která se koná 28. a 29. ledna, je otevřená. Zaregistrovat se můžete na webu registrace.p2d2­.cz.
articles.title: Registrace na Prague PostgreSQL Developer Day 2025 otevřena

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Současný vedoucí projektu Fedora, Matthew Miller, oznámil, že po více než deseti letech končí ve své pozici. Do čela projektu se dostal v červnu 2014 jako sedmý vedoucí a zůstal tam téměř tak dlouho, jak všichni jeho předchůdci dohromady. Když jsem nastupoval do této funkce, doufal jsem, že v ní vydržím pět let. Ale když jsem k tomu dospěl, měl jsem pocit, že jsem se teprve našel, píše Matthew Miller.
articles.title: Matthew Miller po deseti letech končí jako vedoucí projektu Fedora

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Dorka Volavkova)
articles.description: DevConf.CZ 2025 je 17. ročníkem každoročně pořádané a volně přístupné konference pro všechny open source nadšence. Tradičně proběhne v prostorách FIT VUT v Brně v termínu 12. – 14. června 2025 (čtvrtek - sobota). Veškeré info naleznete na webu konference.
articles.title: DevConf.CZ 2025 hledá přednášející, přihlaste se do 2. března

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Spoločnosť X (bývalý Twitter) umožnila používať svojho AI asistenta Grok aj pre používateľov, ktorí využívajú len základnú, bezplatnú verziu X účtu. Grok sa postupne začal zjavovať pre základné účty od 6. decembra.
articles.title: X sprístupnila AI asistenta pre neplatiacich používateľov

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Organizátoři komunitní konference Bratislava OpenCamp vyhlásili datum konání příštího ročníku. Ten se uskuteční 5. dubna 2025 opět na FIIT STU v Bratislave. Prvý aj druhý ročník konferencie sa tešil účasti okolo 300 ľudí, veríme že tretí ročník bude ešte lákavejší, doufají pořadatelé a dodávají, že kapacita je přibližně 650 míst.
articles.title: Bratislava OpenCamp proběhne 5. dubna 2025, hledají se přednášející

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 51/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Další kouzla grafenu: 5 vrstev a kosočtverce. Čipy, na nichž stojí svět: ASML, TSMC, Tchajwan. První mikroskopické snímky dokazují altermagnetismus. Zkreslené vnímání: uzlům intuitivně nerozumíme. Temné komety.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Detekovali exotické kvazičástice, jejichž hmotnost závisí na směru pohybu

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Vánoce, Vánoce přicházejí… A s nimi i vánoční nabídka od Goodoffer24, která je skutečně skvělá, pokud hledáte jak a kde nakoupit klíče na doživotní licenci Windows nebo Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Vánoční Windows 11 za €20 a Office €24 jen jednou za rok Goodoffer24

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nová metoda nabízí efektivnější vyhledávání dat z dlouhodobých datových úložišť na bázi syntetických polymerů. Bezpečnostní trendy pro rok 2025: zločinecké kouřové clony a demokratizace kyberútoků. Efektivní ukládání dat pomocí technologie ePMR. Fortinet pokračuje v rozšiřování generativní umělé inteligence napříč svým portfoliem. Jak naučit modely umělé inteligence efektivně spolupracovat.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Jak naučit modely umělé inteligence efektivně spolupracovat

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 50/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: V Evropě vzniknou „továrny“ na umělou inteligenci, Česko bude jejich součástí. Důkazy o primordiálních černých dírách se mohou skrývat v planetkách, nebo dokonce v běžných objektech na Zemi.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Protonové baterie mohou mít proti lithiu řadu výhod

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Přehled listopadových vydání Jaderných novin: stav vydání jádra a seznam článků týkajících se jádra.
articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za listopad 2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: HP Wolf Security nabízí ochranu firemních počítačů před fyzickými kybernetickými útoky. ČSÚ: Tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč. Cloudový trh nejen roste, ale tempo se navíc ještě zrychluje. Nasazení AI vyžaduje týmové úsilí. Jak řešit nedostatek dovedností v kyberbezpečnosti v malých a středně velkých podnicích.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Podle ČSÚ tržby v ICT sektoru loni přesáhly bilion Kč

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 49/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Vesmír v krabici: Slabiny simulační hypotézy. Lingvisté z Olomouce personalizují jazyk umělé inteligence. Jak se vyznat v algoritmech pro kvantové počítače? Sledovali tanec elektronů v záři explodujících neutronových hvězd.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Mozek je jako fraktál a systém poblíž fázového přechodu

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Bez člověka u počítače kvalitní AI nevybudujete, říká regionální šéf Dell Technologies. Agenti AI a lidé budou společně pracovat na úspěchu u zákazníků. GFI Software: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva. Nový Red Hat Device Edge snižuje latenci a zefektivňuje úlohy AI na okraji sítě. Portworx umožní zrychlení úloh v systému Kubernetes. Fortinet posiluje umělou inteligenci u ochrany dat a řízení vnitřních rizik.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Reakce společnosti TP-Link ke zprávě ohledně možného zákazu prodeje výrobků společnosti v USA: "TP-Link Systems Inc. se sídlem v Irvine v Kalifornii, přední světový dodavatel síťových řešení a produktů chytré domácnosti, již není spojena s čínskou společností TP-Link Technologies, která prodává své výrobky výhradně v Číně."
articles.title: Reakce společnosti TP-Link ke zprávě ohledně možného zákazu prodeje výrobků společnosti v USA

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývojáři mobilního operačního systému /e/OS (Wikipedie) představili nový webový instalátor. Zatím v beta verzi. Běží v Google Chrome a na Chromiu založených prohlížečích. Firefox nepodporuje WebUSB. Současně byla představena nová verze /e/OS 2.6.3.
articles.title: Nový webový instalátor /e/OS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Vývojáři open source platformy Home Assistant pro monitorování a řízení inteligentní domácnosti představili open source hardwarového hlasového asistenta Home Assistant Voice Preview Edition. Cena je 59 dolarů.
articles.title: Home Assistant Voice Preview Edition

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Farid Abdelnour se v příspěvku na blogu rozepsal o novinkám v nejnovější verzi 24.12.0 editoru videa Kdenlive (Wikipedie). Ke stažení také na Flathubu.
articles.title: Novinky v Kdenlive 24.12.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: CSIRT.CZ upozorňuje na linuxový rootkit PUMAKIT umožňující eskalaci oprávnění, skrývání souborů a adresářů a maskování před systémovými nástroji. Využívá také pokročilé mechanismy utajení a komunikace s řídícími servery. Skládá se z několika komponent, včetně dropperu „cron“, paměťových spustitelných souborů, rootkitu LKM „puma.ko“ a uživatelského rootkitu Kitsune.
articles.title: Linuxový rootkit PUMAKIT

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: GitHub Copilot ve Visual Studio Code je nově zdarma. Samozřejmě s omezením: 2 000 dokončení kódu za měsíc a 50 chatových zpráv měsíčně. Na výběr je Claude 3.5 Sonnet od Anthropicu a GPT-4o od OpenAI.
articles.title: GitHub Copilot ve Visual Studio Code nově zdarma

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová verze 2.18 svobodného video editoru Flowblade (GitHub, Wikipedie). Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání. Videoukázky funkcí Flowblade na Vimeu. Instalovat lze také z Flathubu.
articles.title: Flowblade 2.18

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
In the Warframe 1999 quest, there comes a time when you will have to decide who’s on point. Right before the buildup to the initial end of the quest, you’ll control someone other than Arthur, but who will it be?


Who should you pick during the “Who’s on point” choice in Warframe 1999?


In this scenario, you’ll choose between Arthur, Aoi, Amir, and Lettie. Each of them will have their own loadouts and passive dialogue. The other two, Quincy and Eleanor, are absent in this part due to other things that happened (trying to avoid spoilers).


With the four choices, here is the loadout for each:


Arthur



Ax-52 


Vesper 77


Skana



Aoi



Burston


Protokol Hira


Bo



Amir



Amprex


Protokol Vesek


Lacera



Lettie



Latron


Protokol 95


Dual Kamas



This part of the quest can be beaten with any of the characters chosen. It all really boils down to which loadout you like best. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


Personally, I found Amir to be the “best” choice here just because his loadout has the most AoE potential. You’ll be facing a swarm of Techrot enemies, and his Amprex alone can mow down these enemies with ease. Not to mention, his Lacera has the best DPS, attack pattern, and reach compared to all the other Hex members’ melee weapons. 


His ability kit is Volt’s, too, so he can speed things up and decimate crowds with his Discharge ability. Honestly, if you want to get through the quest faster to get to the bounty stuff, just pick Amir.


Is there a difference on who’s on point?


There is no difference or loss in who you pick for this particular part of the quest. In true Warframe fashion, the dialogue and some things will be spiritually different, but the outcome will always be the same. 


In the end, once you get past the Techrot section, you’ll eventually get to the Legacyte part of the quest, where you’ll play as Eleanor. 

The post Warframe 1999 who’s on point? Which character should you choose? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: Warframe 1999 who’s on point? Which character should you choose?

Epic Games Store had already confirmed that the Cabin will be returning ahead of Christmas to serve great presents for all the players. The event is now live, and players can log in to the game daily to unlock new gifts to add to their collection. Let's take a look at all the items that are available as part of the offerings, including the precious Yulejacket skin.


How to get all Fortnite Winterfest 2024 presents


The process of obtaining the presents is pretty much the same irrespective of which one you pick.



Login to your game.


Check the top part of your main screen. You'll find a snowball logo at the very top.


Click on it, and you'll be taken to the Cabin.


The gi…
articles.title: All Fortnite Winterfest 2024 presents and how to get them

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
Snoop Dogg has been dominating the Fortnite space for a hot minute, being part of two major events. He’s now back for the Winterfest event, adding much-needed holiday joy. So, if you want to get your hands on a free Snoop Dogg skin in Fortnite, check below.


How to get the free Snoop Dogg skin in Fortnite


To get the free Snoop Dogg skin in Fortnite, you have to open the gifts in the Winterfest Lodge area from the main menu. One of the gifts will contain the Santa Dogg outfit, which is Snoop Dogg dressed up in a Santa outfit.


Unfortunately, the skin is not available at this time. There are other gifts you can open to get free holiday-themed items usable in the Battle Royale and other modes.


This skin is separate from all the other skins Snoop Dogg has had so far. Those include the ones from the Music Pass and other collab skins previously made available in the market. Those are not included in the free Christmas event.


Image via Epic Games


Since the event runs until January 7, 2025, he will be made available sometime before this concludes. Just log in every day and open the gifts left for you here.


Eventually, there will be more gifts. As time progresses, more will show up, but have not been fully added into the game just yet. You don’t even need to actively play to be eligible to open these either.


These are all pre-determined gifts from various NPCs in the game. Even that big Yulejacket gift on the left is pre-determined to be the other free skin.


We’ll be sure to let you know when Snoop’s gift is made available. For now, enjoy the other freebies and festivities during the event.

The post How to get the free Snoop Dogg skin in Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get the free Snoop Dogg skin in Fortnite

You need to hit certain Chemistry Ranks with each Hex syndicate member to have the option to date them. Although, the rank requi…

At the end of every year, GTA Online rolls in some holiday shenanigans. We have some returning features to look forward to for 2024, including the valuable Happy Holidays Hauler. Here's how to find and loot the Holiday Hauler in GTA Online.


Where to find Happy Holidays Hauler in GTA Online (2024)


The Happy Holidays Hauler spawns in the heart of Los Santos at Legion Square. It spawns more when you join a Public Session, as solo ones take up to an hour for it to make an appearance. The process works similarily to the Gooch, another feature added to the game's winter update. You'll receive a notification of its arrival, marked with a blue truck icon on the map. Those who haven't seen this prompt after a short period should join another server for a quick refresh.


Screenshot by Destructo…

Open your inventory screen by either pressing I (PC) or down…

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Fortnite Winterfest 2024 began as scheduled on December 20, and it brings a whole bunch of rewards for the players, including the Yulejacket skin.


The festive season has finally arrived, and players can finally open the colorful gifts that can be found at the Cabin. It was already confirmed that the gifting season will be back once again, and the Yulejacket skin is certainly the top draw in my books. As things stand, this skin might test your patience if you want to get it on day one of the fest.


How to find the Yulejacket skin in Fortnite


The Yulejacket skin is part of the Winterfest 2024 offerings, so you won't have to spend any resources. It's situated in one of the many colored boxes that can be found at the Cabin. You can access the location from the main menu itself (look for the special icon at the top of your home screen).


It was already rumored there would be 14 different gifts, and that appears to be the case once again. If you believe in rumors, the Yulejacket skin is in the Green box with the Red Bow box (one of the two largest boxes).


Image via Destructoid


It appears that if you try to open the box on the very first day, you can't. Once you pick it, you will see that the box is saved for the last day. In all likelihood, this is indeed the box from where you might get the Yulejacket skin.


All the other boxes I picked can be immediately opened, which makes it clearer about where the skin is. In fact, Yulejacket is the only skin that's part of the Fortnite Winterfest 2024 offerings, which makes sense for Epic to lock it behind a type of advent calendar.


Nevertheless, there are still some really fun rewards you can unlock in the meantime. You can open one box daily, and they will feature random rewards ranging from Pickaxe to Emotes. Make sure to log in to the game every day so that you can unbox a present in the Cabin every day.

The post How to get the Yulejacket skin in Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get the Yulejacket skin in Fortnite

The Hex, Warframe 1999's ragtag band of do-gooding vigilantes, has immediately captured the hearts of Warframe players around the world. 


This latest free expansion to the online game provides a romance minigame in which players can text-chat and eventually kiss the stoic biotechnologically-enhanced warrior of their dreams on New Year's Eve. Going far beyond the longing looks and implied romance of games like Final Fantasy XIV and World of Warcraft, Warframe has a thoughtful, in-depth system around friendships and relationships with the Hex that is well worth playing.


Rich characterization and damn good writing


Warframe has always been known for its strong writing, but 1999 lifts this to a new level with the text exchanges you have with the Hex. It's a great opportunity to explore th…
articles.title: Why you should be playing Warframe 1999’s romance minigame

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
The Gooch is back in GTA 5 Online right ahead of Christmas, and you can spawn it to win an exclusive rare outfit to add to your collection.


In many ways, Rockstar has reintroduced older quests once again, which serves as a great chance for those who missed it last year. The snowman locations, for example, remain the same, and so does the Gooch. It's Rockstar's take on the nefarious Grinch, and you'll have to perform certain tasks to make it spawn.


How to find the Gooch in GTA 5 Online


The process of spawning the Gooch in GTA 5 Online remains the same. The location and timing of its spawn are random, but there are certain prerequisites you'll have to complete. You'll need to spend at least 48 real-time minutes in a single play session with two or more players.


You'll also need to have enough money and snacks on your in-game character because the Grooch has its eyes on that stuff. If you have them and spend the required time, the creature will spawn randomly and loot your resources. While the timing will be random, there will be a green smoke before your character gets knocked out.




The objective now will be to get back what's been looted from you. Open your mini-map, and you'll find the Gooch's location marked as a red dot. You'll have to pursue and kill it, but doing so is entirely up to you. You can engage with it directly and use a weapon you have or just run it over with a vehicle.


Once you complete the task, you'll get back all the items that were stolen from you. Additionally, you'll also get the Gooch mask and full outfit. The rare costume will be a great addition to your inventory, but it will also be available for a limited time.

The post How to spawn the Gooch in GTA 5 Online appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to spawn the Gooch in GTA 5 Online

articles.author: Ruben Circelli

Feeling lonely? Well, if you're a Warframe player, you won't have to anymore, thanks to a new romance system in the 1999 update. But just how many partners can you rack up?


Before we get into how high your virtual, shall we say, body count can go, you should take a look at who your options are, how the new calendar system works, and make sure to complete the 1999 quest. Once that's all done, read on to learn exactly how many people you can romance in Warframe: 1999.


You can romance one person at a time in Warframe: 1999, but...


The romance system works in Warframe by leveling up your relationship with people to a certain level, and you'll have the option to start a relationship with them. Once the in-game 1999 calendar cycles through a year or a real-time month, you'll get a New Year…
articles.title: Can you romance multiple people in Warframe: 1999?

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
The first quest to kick off the Fortnite Winterfest event has you tracking down Sgt. Winter and speaking to him. With the map and NPC locations changing with Winterfest, he can be tricky to find. Here is how to find Sgt. Winter in the Winterfest event in Fortnite and complete the quest.


Screenshot by Destructoid


Where to find Sgt. Winter in Fortnite Winterfest event


You can find Sgt. Winter standing around at the crashed airplane located in the snowy mountains just south of the center of the map. If you look at the map above, we've circled the area in red for you. There is no marked location near Sgt. Winter, but it's south of Foxy Floodgate across the frozen lake, and northwest of Masked Meadows.


Once you land at the crashed plane, you'll immediately see Sgt. Winter standing near the front of the plane. Speak to him to complete your first quest for the Winterfest event!


Be aware that a lot of people are dropping here either to do this first quest, or to get some easy kills by taking out those doing the quest. Just make sure you drop close to Sgt. Winters and immediately speak to him to complete the quest before someone wipes you out.


Another option is to land just outside of the area where Sgt. Winter is, wait for a minute or two, then go in and speak to him. The next quest has you speaking to Noir on the top floor of a building in Seaport City, so it too will require dealing with a high-activity drop area.


As with most quests in Fortnite, you can also open your Quests window and click on the Case Assignment for Sgt. Winter to get a marker placed on your map that indicates where Sgt. Winter can be found.

The post How to find Sgt. Winter in Winterfest Fortnite appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to find Sgt. Winter in Winterfest Fortnite

articles.author: Steven Mills
articles.description:
The annual Fortnite Winterfest is here, bringing holiday-themed events, quests, and most importantly, presents. However, some users have reported not being able to see or get any presents from the Fortnite Winterfest event. Here's some solutions on how to fix the no present bug in Fortnite Winterfest and start earning presents for the event.


Screenshot by Destructoid


How to fix no presents in Fortnite Winterfest


For most players, the no present bug in Fortnite Winterfest is actually just a visual bug that occurs because Fortnite will only show so many quests for each game mode. Therefore, you should switch game modes to get the game to force the Daily Gifts present popup to trigger. This means if you are on build mode, try switching to zero build, and vice versa. This fixes the no present bug issue for most players.


However, if you're still having the bug, or you were able to get to the present screen in the lodge but it says you have none when you should, there are some more things you can try:



Make sure the Fortnite servers aren't having problems. If the servers are down or congested from a lot of players jumping in right when they come online, it can lag out the presents. In this case, just try again later.


Double check your own internet connection. If your internet connection is dropping or unstable it can also make the presents not load. If you are on a wireless connection, try switching to a more stable wired one.


Check your Fortnite version. The easiest way to do this fix is to simply restart your game which should trigger the latest update to start downloading. If you're not on the most up-to-date version, new features like the presents will not work.



Keep in mind you will receive one new preset per day, so if you've already opened todays, you have to wait until reset you obtain your next one.

The post How to fix the no present bug in Fortnite Winterfest appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to fix the no present bug in Fortnite Winterfest

How to build the Vesper 77 in Warframe

articles.author: Elliott Gatica
articles.description:
A Pokémon game can’t really be a Pokémon game without trading. With the recent success in Pokémon TCG Pocket, it begs the question: when is trading coming? 


What can players expect from this? We’ll have everything we know about the absent feature in the game and when we can expect it to be released.


When is trading coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket?


Trading will be coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket in January 2025. However, there do seem to be some limitations on what can be traded.


In an official post by the admins on the Pokémon TCG Pocket website, “certain cards” are going to be allowed to be traded in this January update. What that entails is yet to be determined.


What we can gather from this is that there won’t be full trading capabilities in the update. It’ll be a soft launch where only a handful of allowed cards will be tradeable. Whether this is to test the waters or see if there are any loopholes, exploits, or outside transactions, we will not know.




This function will “gradually expand the selection of cards that are able to be traded” after the initial January 2025 update. 


As of right now, if you are looking to get specific cards from people or just rarer stuff like EX and full-art cards, your best bet is to keep buying packs and using the Wonder Pick feature. 


When we get more information on the card limitations, we’ll be sure to let you know. 


For now, the Mythical Island booster set is out, with many new cards to get your hands on to shake up the meta. Not only do you have the legendary birds to worry about, but Celebi decks are now the new bane of many players’ existences. 


Trading cannot come sooner so that we can lessen the RNG from opening dozens of packs.

The post When is trading coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: When is trading coming to Pokémon TCG Pocket?

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The easiest way to hurt a pirate site, at least temporarily, is by taking away its domain name. Historically, domain name registries have been hesitant to take action but with the right approach, progress can be made. This week, anti-piracy group BREIN reported that following their complaints, the .nl and .eu registries took action against several 'pirate' domains. On closer inspection, it appears that copyright has little to do with it.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: EU and NL Domain Registries Take Down Piracy-Linked Domains

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Coordinated by Italy last month, a huge law enforcement operation reportedly 'dismantled' a pirate IPTV service with 22 million users. That's an extraordinary number and shows why countries like Italy have adopted mass site blocking measures. Logic suggests that the removal of such a huge player from the market might reduce the need for blocking measures, if only temporarily. The data shows that in the wake of the action, blocking demands significantly increased.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Dismantling a 22m User Pirate IPTV Service Led to Big Rise in ISP Blocking

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Two decades ago, the torrenting world lost a legend: Suprnova.org. This pioneering file-sharing site, once a hub for millions of users, was abruptly shut down on December 19th, 2004. Today, we revisit the Suprnova story and speak with the site's founder about its lasting impact and the YouTube empire he built in recent years.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Suprnova’s Founder Speaks: 20 Years, Many Lessons, and a YouTube Empire

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italians who simply view pirate IPTV via illicit subscriptions have been warned for months that their activities could be reported to the judicial authorities for potential prosecution. As part of an investigation into a pirate IPTV subscription seller, a total of 23 people have appeared in court in recent months for simply buying a pirate package. Judges in two separate proceedings have now acquitted all 23 after concluding that this type of piracy isn't actually a crime.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Judges Acquit a Total of 23 Pirate IPTV Subscribers: Personal Use is Not a Crime

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Federal Court of Canada has issued a new site blocking order requiring major ISPs to block access to Soap2Day domains. The order was issued in response to a lawsuit filed by Netflix, Bell, and several major Hollywood studios alleging copyright infringement.  The operators of the associated Soap2Day domains must pay millions of Canadian dollars in damages. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Netflix and Hollywood Obtain Canadian Site Blocking Order Against Pirate ‘Brand’ Soap2Day

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Suing people for consuming content illegally can be a risky endeavor for companies with brands to protect. Nevertheless, sports rightsholders now seem prepared to put brand integrity on the line in their fight against IPTV pirates. Spain's LaLiga is already mailing out 'fines', ostensibly to people who simply watched pirate streams. Predictably, there's more to it than that.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: LaLiga Isn’t ‘Fining’ IPTV Pirates For Viewing Streams, But For Providing Them

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
For over a decade, The Pirate Bay has been accepting Bitcoin donations. In dollar terms, this provided a relatively modest but consistent revenue stream. However, if the torrent site had held onto its early Bitcoin, it could have amassed a small fortune, worth $14 million today. The same applies to BitcoinTorrentz, which once charged today's equivalent of $8,000 per gigabyte transferred.  
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: The Pirate Bay’s Million-Dollar Bitcoin Donations: Hidden Goldmine or Spent Treasure?

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Japan-based anti-piracy group CODA is reporting new successes in its overseas efforts to disrupt access to pirate sites. Earlier this month, operators of pirate anime sites in Brazil received in-person visits from CODA, acting on behalf of three major Japanese anime producers. CODA reports that Bakashi.tv, the third most-visited anime site in Brazil, shut down among 15 in total. No other sites are officially named, but our unofficial list provides a few pointers.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Japanese Anime Companies Shut Down Another 15 Pirate Sites in Brazil

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Red One' tops the chart, followed by 'Venom: The Last Dance'. 'Heretic' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 12/16/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The first pirate site blocking order in Canada was 'discontinued' this week. The plaintiffs, including rightsholders Bell and Rogers, won't request an extension of the landmark blocking measures against IPTV service GoldTV. Interestingly, many of the targeted domains are still online. No reason was provided for the discontinuation, but costs and changed priorities likely play a role.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Canada’s First Pirate Site Blocking Order Quietly Expires

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a recent filing at the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals, ISP Cox maintains that DMCA subpoenas don't apply to Internet providers. Several movie studios hope to convince the court otherwise, as that would strengthen their piracy enforcement efforts, making it easier to identify online pirates. According to Cox, however, Congress clearly excluded ISPs from this legal 'shortcut'.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cox to Appeals Court: DMCA Subpoenas Don’t Apply to Us, Period

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In an ongoing escalation of its fight against online sports piracy, media giant Canal+ secured court orders compelling DNS providers Quad9 and Vercara to block access to pirate streaming sites in France. Quad9 says that it's determined to appeal what it sees as an absurd application of copyright law. For now, however, it will block the targeted domain names globally.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: French Piracy Blocking Order Goes Global, DNS Service Quad9 Vows to Fight

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Italy's Piracy Shield IPTV blocking system is back in the news today after yet another completely avoidable blocking blunder. On Monday night, yet another CDN IP address was added to the blocklist rendering innocent sites unavailable. Italian tech news site DDaY, a long-standing critic of Piracy Shield's indiscriminate blocking, was among those affected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Piracy Shield Blacks Out Tech News Site by Blocking Another CDN IP

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Trouble continues for the popular torrent site TorrentGalaxy. After several technical issues last week, the site has become unreachable. At the same time, the related 'TGxGoodies' uploader accounts at other torrent sites have been inactive for days. TorrentGalaxy switched owners earlier this year, but it's unclear what's behind the recent problems. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: TorrentGalaxy’s Troubles Silence Popular Upload Bots (Update)

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Music streaming app Musi claims Apple removed its app from the App Store after "backroom conversations" with key music industry players.  The app developer alleges this was an "unfair" and "tainted" removal process designed to put it out of business.  Musi is seeking a preliminary injunction to reinstate its app while the legal battle plays out. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Musi Decries Apple’s App Store Removal: A “Backroom Scheme” with Music Industry (Update)

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Indie videgame portal Itch.io is effectively offine today after a brand protection company reported the platform for "fraud/phishing" for what was a problem easily solved using a DMCA notice. According to Google's transparency databases, the same company has repeatedly attempted to use the DMCA to solve alleged trademark infringement but had its complaints rejected.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bogus Complaint Disables Itch.io, Google Ignored Same Sender For Years

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Cloudflare is actively disabling access to some pirate site URLs on its network, informing visitors that the requested pages are unavailable for legal reasons. While these types of 'HTTP 451' error messages are relatively rare, they are nothing more than Cloudflare complying with its legal obligations under the DMCA.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Cloudflare Blocks Pirate Site URLs “For Legal Reasons”

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Greece is buzzing with news of a historic, landmark decision by a local court, to imprison a person for five months for subscribing to a pirate IPTV service. The news warrants an informed conversation about creators' rights and how the judicial system has sharpened its response to piracy. However, until evidence is produced to the contrary, the story should be stamped "propaganda" and noted for an offense of its own: a distraction from genuine progress in the fight against piracy.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ‘Historic Decision’ to Imprison Pirate IPTV User Smells of Propaganda

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
In a bid to identify individuals allegedly involved in creating and distributing cheats for the video game Destiny 2, Bungie has subpoenaed the U.S.-based cryptocurrency exchange Kraken.  The subpoena seeks to identify the owner of a Bitcoin wallet, who is believed to be a European resident. This individual, however, is contesting the subpoena, claiming it violates EU privacy laws and other regulations.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Bungie Targets Bitcoin Wallet in Effort to Expose ‘Destiny 2’ Cheaters

articles.author: nospam@scummvm.org (sev)
articles.description:
We've been working for a while on the next ScummVM release, and it is time for a call for public testing.
Support for a number of new engines and games for the existing ones was added, and we need your special attention to the following titles:
Orion Burger.
Total Eclipse and Total Eclipse 2.
Thimbleweed Park.
The Space Bar.
Moonbase Commander. (with multiplayer support)
Backyard Basketball.
Unrest.
Rise of the Dragon.
Castle Master.
Wait for it! Issue 3. Song for a Hare. (Ну, погоди! Выпуск 3. Песня для зайца)
Mask Show. (Маски-шоу)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Meeting Sea Rat. (Три маленькие белые мышки. Визит Морской крысы)
The Adventures of the Good Soldier Schweik. (Похождения бравого солдата Швейка)
Marvellous Mice Adventures: Sea Rat's Birthday. (Три маленькие белые мышки. День рождения морской крысы)
Besides these newly supported games, almost half of the current 108 engines have notable changes. Thus, testing more games is always a good thing.
All testing must be done with stable builds, not development ones. Please report bugs or oddities on our issue tracker.
A detailed list of all exciting new features and fixes is available in our NEWS file.
We are looking forward to your reports about successful and unsuccessful playthroughs and bugs reported!
>
articles.title: Help us to test the upcoming ScummVM 2.9.0!

To všechno funguje velmi dobře. Ale je to proloženo otravnou hrou, kde pořádně nefunguje boj, stealth ani puzzly, a jejíž interaktivita zdržuje od toho cool příběhu.

articles.description:
Za pár dní má v našich kinech (a po celém světě) premiéru "remasterovaná verze" kultovní animované podívané Interstella 5555. A je důležité říct si něco o tom, o jakou podívanou vlastně jde a v čem přesně spočívá ten "remaster".
U zrodu tohoto počinu stálo elektronické hudební duo Daft Punk, které v roce 2001 vydalo své album "Discovery". K písničkám z alba vyšly animované videoklipy, které produkoval Leidži Macumoto, což byl kultovní japonský výtvarník (zemřel loni), který měl na svém kontě mnoho animovaných seriálů, především ze 70. - 80. let (nejslavnější z nich byl asi "Space Battleship Yamato"). Daft Punk ho oslovili proto, že na jeho seriálech vyrůstali, takže výsledné dílo, včetně "jednodušší" retro animace a naivní zápletky zcela záměrně připomíná staré japonské televizní počiny (n…
articles.title: Recenze: Daft Punk & Leiji Matsumoto's Interstella 5555 - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

Přestože mám muzikály rád, téměř vůbec se u mě nedostavil jakýkoliv pocit dojetí nebo jiná silná emoce a z písniček si téměř nic nepamatuji. Což je bizarní, protože zbožňuji písničky v "Princi egyptském", kterého napsal stejný autor pár let před "Čarodějkou". - Ilča 50 %
articles.title: Audio recenze: Čarodějka [Wicked - Part 1] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Naprosto nezajímavé ve všech směrech, od scénáře, přes výtvarnou podobu a písničky, až po režii. V některých aspektech horší než jednička, v žádných lepší.  (Ilča 40 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Odvážná Vaiana 2 [Moana 2] - 50 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Kvalitní herecké výkony, občas slušná atmosféra, ale scénář je tak děravý, že si každou chvíli říkáte "proč to proboha udělal(a)?" a místy až znemožňuje pochopit, co se právě děje (je to sofistikovaná hra, nebo jí jenom praskly nervy?). Což je diametrální rozdíl oproti skvěle promyšlenému "Tísňovému volání". (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Dozorkyně [Vogter] - 60 %
